subject: Commission Payment Delay
description_text:
Hello!

I am an ambassador in your program and I have one completed order made
almost 2 months ago.
According to your rules, commissions are calculated monthly, but I still
have not received any payment.

I have read your policy carefully, and I belong to the V3 level based on my
follower count (97,000).
However, the system shows a 6% commission, which does not match the V3 rate.

Please check:
1. Why the payment for my order has still not been processed after almost 2
months.
2. Whether my ambassador level is set correctly.
3. When I can expect my commission payout.
*Best regards,*
* Alex*
? *YouTube Creator â€“ Nixon Game World*

? YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@nixon_game
? Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nixon_game
? TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@nixongameworld

conversations.body_text: Hi Nixon,    Okay, we've adjusted your commission rate.  Additionally, please note that the monthly commission payment threshold is $60 (if this month's threshold is not met, the amount will be carried over to the next month and combined with subsequent commissions for payment).
